origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'SonyEricssonAPI.get_RnD_data', 'description': 'This function retrieves the R&D investment data of Sony Ericsson over a specified number of years, focusing on specific technologies.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'company', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the company, e.g., Sony Ericsson.'}, {'name': 'years', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The number of years to retrieve data for.'}, {'name': 'technology', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The specific technology area, e.g., advanced manufacturing, communication equipment, etc.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'RnD_data', 'description': 'The R&D investment data for the specified company, years, and technology.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 SonyEricssonAPI.get_RnD_data, 它的参数输入如下: 'company'是'Sony Ericsson', 'years'是'5', 'technology'是'advanced manufacturing'.
